item.title: Teleport options

item.description:

case 73148: case 4146: //Falador c.teleEffect = 1; c.sendQuest("Where to go?", 2470); c.sendQuest("option1", 2471); c.sendQuest("option2", 2472); c.sendQuest("none", 2473); c.sendFrame164(2469); break;
it comes up with the options but it telrports me to wild zones (using delta)

any one know how do i make it telle me to different places other than the wild zones
